alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 10:59PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Hot Springs, east central Sublette and central Fremont Counties through 1145 PM MDT... At 1059 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dubois to near Wind River Peak. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wind River Peak around 1105 PM MDT. Worthen Meadows Reservoir and Upper Silas Lake around 1110 PM MDT. Frye Lake around 1115 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Sinks Canyon State Park and Lander. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains West
